children.text: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.L.6.3.a Vary sentence patterns for meaning, reader/listener interest, and style.*
CCSS.ELA-Literacy.L.6.3.b Maintain consistency in style and tone.*

text: CCSS.ELA-Literacy.L.6.3 Use knowledge of language and its conventions when writing, speaking, reading, or listening.
